text:
@DearAuntCrabby @realDonaldTrump On CNN and MSN to cut away during a pandemic. I suppose they weren't listening to their boss spew bullshit and personal thoughts really about nothing 45min of that exhausting hr! 
I agree to no longer show this fool , but now it's a show, not the president addressing the nation!
